Hotel description

Ever feel like going back in time to spend a summer in the sixties? Then the Gallia Palace Hotel in Punta Ala (Maremma) is the perfect choice! This exclusive beach hotel combines the luxury of a vacation in Tuscany with the flair of the 60’s. Other things to enjoy here include a well maintained private beach, a large pool, an enticing restaurant and a small relaxing spa area.
The Gallia Palace Hotel in Punta Ala
The flat building of this 5 star beach hotel in Italy has all the marks of 60’s architecture with its elegant foyer, large glass facade and the covered balconies. The interior design and furnishings of the Gallia Palace have also been selected to fit with the charming retro style. After a short 5-10 minute walk guests can reach the beautiful beach of this family hotel or take advantage of the hotel’s shuttle bus service.
The Rooms in Gallia Palace
The rooms of the luxury hotel in Tuscany are also decorated in a tasteful sixties style. Some rooms feature beautiful wood parquet floors while others show off a more typical Tuscan terracotta floors combined with an enticing blend of furniture featuring antique wardrobes, gorgeous old fashioned beds and bright wood furniture. The bathrooms of the beach hotel are another highlight, featuring Carrara marble and floral Vietri tiles and fit perfectly with the style of the whole place.
Activities at the Gallia Palace
The main attraction of the family hotel in the Maremma is the beautiful beach. For lunch, guests can look forward to the ample buffet in the outdoor restaurant tent. The small spa area of the 5 star hotel treats its guests to a range of beauty treatments, a steam bath and a fitness room. The surrounding area also offers plenty of activities to choose from, including golf, tennis, horseback riding, sailing and surfing, as well several fascinating historical sites to visit and experience the Etruscan history and culture!
